body:
Day 11 - Manga 257*
Now, this was good. It wasn't the same thing as the other two, giving a different point of view, while the male tried to forget the past and move on, this version of the female held onto the only thing that she knew, the pain. We could also see that she started to break to the better and eventually gave up which shows that, even if the other things were temporary, she was feeling everything and changing for the better.
Overhaul this one was the best until now since it gaves me a more sense of humanity, never forget grudges but look the other way when something good happens. The art was pretty good too and the way that her thoughts appeared on black, then white and finally black again let's us see that, while she hated the guy at first, she opened and accepted his failures in the middle and, at the end, she understood that seeing him sad was not that fun anymore, hating him for other reasons.
9/10. A good one to read.
Not as good as the other ones but still good 7/10

Part 4
Fuckkkkkkk.. sad end bitch :'/ ... no future ? Yes, why you don't have harem? You true love? Fuckkkk sad :'(
